name: git-selector
description: A Python based Electron app to make switching between projects within a group easier

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . git-selector --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=src/img/app-logo.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="Not a Comapny inc." --version-string.FileDescription="Git Selector program" --version-string.ProductName="Git Selector App"
scripts.package-all: npm run package-mac && npm run package-linux && npm run package-win

author: Jos Craw
